posts.title: Spring Harbor water back on

posts.title: No water in Spring Harbor area
posts.preview: There is currently a widespread problem in the Spring Harbor area with no water or low pressure. There is no need to call; crews are already working on the problem (and the emergency line is overwhelmed anyway). Thank you for your patience.
